name: nw_ws_close_code_t
desc: Types of codes used upon closing a WebSocket connection.

items.name: var nw_ws_close_code_normal_closure: nw_ws_close_code_t
items.desc: A normal closure occurred with no errors.

items.name: var nw_ws_close_code_going_away: nw_ws_close_code_t
items.desc: An endpoint is no longer available, such as when a server is down.

items.name: var nw_ws_close_code_protocol_error: nw_ws_close_code_t
items.desc: An endpoint is terminating the connection due to a protocol error.

items.name: var nw_ws_close_code_unsupported_data: nw_ws_close_code_t
items.desc: An endpoint is terminating the connection because it received a type of data it cannot accept.

items.name: var nw_ws_close_code_no_status_received: nw_ws_close_code_t
items.desc: This value is reserved for local errors and indicates that no Close code was received.

items.name: var nw_ws_close_code_abnormal_closure: nw_ws_close_code_t
items.desc: This value is reserved for local errors and indicates that no Close message was received.

items.name: var nw_ws_close_code_invalid_frame_payload_data: nw_ws_close_code_t
items.desc: An endpoint is terminating the connection because it received data within a message that was inconsistent with the message type.

items.name: var nw_ws_close_code_policy_violation: nw_ws_close_code_t
items.desc: An endpoint is terminating the connection because it received a message that violates its policy.

items.name: var nw_ws_close_code_message_too_big: nw_ws_close_code_t
items.desc: An endpoint is terminating the connection because it received a message that is too big for it to process.

items.name: var nw_ws_close_code_mandatory_extension: nw_ws_close_code_t
items.desc: The WebSocket client expected the server to negotiate one or more extensions that were not negotiated.

items.name: var nw_ws_close_code_internal_server_error: nw_ws_close_code_t
items.desc: The server is terminating the connection because it encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

items.name: var nw_ws_close_code_tls_handshake: nw_ws_close_code_t
items.desc: This value is reserved for local errors and indicates that the TLS handshake failed.
